channel.title: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay
channel.description:
[i][size=10pt]Curently working on this one[/size][/i] [b][size=15pt]PokemonOnline Type1:[/size][/b] is a online card game were you can battle your friends. it uses the old pokemon such as Pikachu, charmander, blastoise ect.... your cards will be randomly picked so that you do not allways get an advantage or disadvantage.
things needed: Pokemon soundtrak testers pokemon pictures < i have most of them>
[b][size=10pt]Pokemon Online Type2:[/size][/b] is a online game were you battle against other pokemon and team roket or even against other players ;).
things needed: pokemon soundtrak pokemon pictures < i have most of them>
[size=13pt][b]Completion: 1%[/b][/size] things done: made BG made pikachu character

item.title: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:29, topic:68408”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=100140.msg1027019#msg1027019 date=1174285756]

Wow… Hasn’t poke’mon gone out of fashion yet? I quit Pokemon in like year 3-4 and that was like when i was like 10…

The 2d gameboy games are fun.
[/quote]

“Used to be” [/quote]

Used to be? I’d rather play pokemon blue for the block-of-what’s known as the original gameboy than any gangsta gang shit you get on ps2/ps3/360/wii any day!

Read full topic
item.source: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay

item.title: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:26, topic:68408”]Cool idea. I’m not a pokemon fan any more, but I remember those games are pretty fun. I actually found my old gameboy 3 or 4 days ago, and I started playing Pokemon Blue lol.

Everybody, please stop flaming him. He has a good idea, but there is no reason to piss on him.[/quote]

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:28, topic:68408”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=100140.msg1026995#msg1026995 date=1174285398]
Wow… Hasn’t poke’mon gone out of fashion yet? I quit Pokemon in like year 3-4 and that was like when i was like 10…
[/quote]

The 2d gameboy games are fun. ;)[/quote]

hehe!! i found my old gameboy pokemon blue, reg and gold the other day lol i don’t want to turn them on because i don’t know what i did with them when i was 9

good idea what are you using for it?

Read full topic
item.source: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay

item.title: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Man pokemon was so amazing! The cards, the games,the tacky little toys you could get. I remember once i got a pokeball and i swear i made a pokemon when i was like 9… its was so fricken ownage!

Pokemon is like the epicenter of my childhood. I just loved it so bad. Then it went away and i wept like a drowning hippo.

Read full topic
item.source: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay

item.title: Pokemon Online ( inclueds sneak peek) 2 types of gameplay
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

this is great…
i never got to find the sensaition of playing pokemon :’(
but i would like to see this, just to play it of course and win
(south park: AND KILL THE EVIL POWER [chinpokemon] lol)
as someone said, and you stick with the orginal 150…
ahhh good times ::gets gameboy+gameboy advance and looks at the gamebay adavnce that mum smashed the screen 4 months 3 days 4 hours 56 minutes (i have a counter on my computer so hahahaha)
*tear comes out
:’(

Read full topic
